site_name: Development Site at Former Chelsea Police Station, Lucan Place, LONDON, SW3 3PB
application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
description: Details required by Conditions 26 (Footway Works) and 27 (Submission of details) of planning permission PP/19/06712 (Demolition of existing building and erection of mixed-use development comprising basement, lower ground and ground floor plus 7 storeys comprising Use Class D1 Nursery and specialist treatment centre at ground and lower ground level, and 31 residential units (8 x 1 bed, 16 x 2 bed, 6 x 3 bed, 1 x 4 bed) and ancillary residential facilities at basement, first floor and above, together with access, servicing, car parking, cycle storage, plant and other associated works (MAJOR APPLICATION))
